attributes.title: AWFUL APP SHOULD BE BANNED
attributes.review: this app is horrible. it keeps making my phone crash. just take it off.

attributes.title: bad app!
attributes.review: after waiting for the app to download which took forever, it wouldn’t even open? if you are having technical difficulties, i suggest you reach out to your friend anonymous and maybe he can help! best of luck!:)

attributes.title: Hated it !!!
attributes.review: It was terrible. I can’t believe this would even be in the App Store. Take it down please!🥰

attributes.title: Never again 🧚‍♂️✨
attributes.review: I thought this was about Trump... but animal cruelty? Really? I will never download this app again. Ban it
When I got the app I automatically saw trump’s hideous face and I threw up. Also, the app is a bad design and works terribly. 🤮

attributes.title: Ummmm..
attributes.review: I downloaded and the app is just trash period and makes my phone crash 👉🏾🗑

attributes.title: This app is terrible DO NOT GET😠
attributes.review: This was a waste of my time I wish I can put it at a zero Star 😠 delete this app!!!!

attributes.title: not what i expected
attributes.review: i got this app because i heard if you downloaded it, you’d have good luck for the rest of the year but unfortunately, this whole year has been a series of unfortunate events and looks like the app was a flop

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: It’s absolutely a disgusting app. Sent me TONS of spam and made me go insane. Get your point across once, and then GO AWAY.

attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: I give this a 0/10 it gave my phone a virus please do NOT download this it is awful
